org.jgrapes.portal.base.events

Class PortalLayoutChanged

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event<Void>
        • org.jgrapes.portal.base.events.PortalLayoutChanged
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<Void>, org.jgrapes.core.Associator, org.jgrapes.core.Eligible

    public class PortalLayoutChanged
extends org.jgrapes.core.Event<Void>

    Notifies the server about a change of the portal layout. This event is sent by the browser when the layout changes due to user interaction (e.g. moving the preview representations) or due to notifications from the server (e.g. RenderPortlet).

    The server should persist the layout and pass it back to the browser in response to PortalReady (see this event’s description for details).
